description: This file is a Vitest configuration file for setting up testing environment, extending base Vite config with specific test options.

methods.name: mergeConfig
methods.description: Merges multiple configuration objects into a single configuration.

methods.name: defineConfig
methods.description: Defines a Vitest configuration object with type checking and auto-completion support.

methods.name: configDefaults
methods.description: Default configuration options provided by Vitest.

methods.name: fileURLToPath
methods.description: Converts a file URL to a system path, used to determine the root directory for tests.
